title: UpFront - Chomsky: I'd vote for Clinton over Republicans
description: Renowned American academic Noam Chomsky tells Mehdi Hasan that he would "absolutely" vote for leading US democratic presidential candidate Hillary Clinton if he lived in a swing state."If you happen to be in a swing state, where itâ€™s going to have an effect on who becomes president, you should definitely vote," Chomsky says. Then adds: "My vote would be against the Republican candidate."Watch part two of UpFront's special interview with Chomsky Friday at 1930GMT.- Subscribe to our channel: http://bit.ly/AJSubscribe- Follow us on Twitter: https://twitter.com/AJEnglish- Find us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/aljazeera- Check our website: http://www.aljazeera.com/
